Summary: A triangular object flying low in January, 2008, hovered as close as 3 car lengths away from us while we were at a stop sign.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: sighting detailsi don't remember the exact date, but this occurred in mid to late january of this year. i hesitated to share this because i don't want to be considered a crack-pot by my community, but i just have to tell someone. my husband and i were on our way back home after attending a retirement seminar at the monument inn restarant near baytown, texas. it was a very dark night, with no moon. we were eastbound of hwy 565 south between 9-9:30pm. we came to the 4-way stop at the intersection of 565s, and hwy.3180 just south of mont belvieu, texas. while we were at the stop sign i saw a triangular object come up fast on our left. it was flying low, approx. 10-15ft. off the ground. it slowed and hovered next to our vehicle probably 3 car lengths to our left for 15-20 seconds, then at a very high rate of speed shot off at a 45 degree angle away from us headed north\northeast cruising low over the housetops along 3180 before we lost sight of it. it was headed in the direction of an area of new construction where rice fields had existed in the recent past. i asked my husband what that was,...could it have been a plane, and he said "planes can't move that fast". i asked him to turn north along 3180 and follow it to see if it had crashed, but he said "no, lets go home". (he now says he doesn't remember seeing anything and denies saying it was faster than a plane. he is in denial, but i remember vividly what it looked like.) the object was totally silent...it made no noise at all. the inside area of the triangle was very dark...emitting no light, (almost as though it absorbed it) yet the outside perimeter of the vehicle was encased in a glowing cylidrical neon green light source. the neon glow extended out away from the craft, but the light didn't reveal details as to the structure of the inner area of the triangle. did anyone else see anything like it in our area? i know that people had seen some strange things in the sky around stephenville, texas earlier in january, but the newspaper didn't describe anything like what i saw.
